matrix-project.description: Build a full debug build from SVN. Build with assertions, debug code, assume, tracing, and interpreted gc.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386/client:/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH cd trunk
#HUDSON_DIR must be set in environment variables!
./d.sh clean ./d.sh copyphoneme ./d.sh -DTRACING_ENABLED=true -DASSERTIONS_ENABLED=true -DDEBUG_CODE_ENABLED=true -DENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING=true -DNATIVE_GC_ONLY=false -DJ2ME.STATS=true -DTYPEMAP=true -DFULL_SLOT_CLEARING_ANALYSIS=true -DCHECK_SLOT_CLEARING=true -DTRUST_SLOT_CLEARING=false -DSUITE_VERIFIER=true ./d.sh -DTRACING_ENABLED=true -DASSERTIONS_ENABLED=true -DDEBUG_CODE_ENABLED=true -DENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING=true -DNATIVE_GC_ONLY=false -DJ2ME.STATS=true -DTYPEMAP=true -DFULL_SLOT_CLEARING_ANALYSIS=true -DCHECK_SLOT_CLEARING=true -DTRUST_SLOT_CLEARING=false -DSUITE_VERIFIER=true -assume -tracing -typemap rom -strip:d -lnt -metadata cldc imp debugger
./d.sh map -cp:cldc/j2meclasses:imp/j2meclasses:debugger/j2meclasses squawk.suite ./d.sh genspec ./d.sh jvmenv ./d.sh systemproperties ./d.sh Mnemonics ./d.sh OPC ./d.sh OperandStackEffect ./d.sh Verifier ./squawk -h ./squawk -version $HUDSON_DIR/bin/runsmoketest.sh DELEGATING $HUDSON_DIR/bin/rundsmoketest.sh DELEGATING
ls -l > sizereport.txt
mkdir tmp cp squawk squawk.suite squawk.suite.metadata tmp ./d.sh clean mv tmp/squawk tmp/squawk.suite tmp/squawk.suite.metadata . rmdir tmp
